element-citation.article-title: Identifying tumor in pancreatic neuroendocrine neoplasms from Ki67 images using transfer learning

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Niazi, M. K. K. et al. Identifying tumor in pancreatic neuroendocrine neoplasms from Ki67 images using transfer learning. PLoS One13, e0195621. 10.1371/journal.pone.0195621 (2018).29649302
